requirements.summary: Create a booking form interface for users to submit AC service requests
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes input fields for customer name and phone number
Form includes a dropdown or radio buttons for service type selection with all four options
Form includes date and time picker inputs
Form includes an address input field
Form has a submit button that creates a new booking

file_operations.description: Create a booking form component with fields for customer name, contact number, service type dropdown (installation, repair, maintenance, cleaning), preferred date and time pickers, and address input. Use shadcn/ui form components (Input, Select, Button, Label) for consistent styling. On submit, call backend createBooking method with a generated unique ID and the form data. Display success/error feedback to the user.
Import and render the BookingForm component in the main application view. Ensure the form is accessible from the primary interface so users can create new bookings.

requirements.summary: Display a list of all AC service bookings with ability to update status or cancel bookings
acceptanceCriteria: UI displays all bookings in a list or table format
Each booking shows customer name, service type, scheduled date/time, address, and status
UI provides controls to update the status of a booking
UI provides a control to cancel (delete) a booking

file_operations.description: Create a booking list component that fetches all bookings using the backend getAllBookings method. Display bookings in a table format using shadcn/ui Table component, showing customer name, service type, scheduled date and time, address, and current status. For each booking, provide a dropdown or button group to update the booking status (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled) using the backend updateBookingStatus method, and a delete button that calls the backend deleteBooking method. Refresh the list after status updates or deletions.

Import and render the BookingList component below the BookingForm in the main application view. Ensure the list is visible and updates dynamically when new bookings are created or existing bookings are modified.

requirements.summary: Design a professional and clean visual theme suitable for a service booking application
acceptanceCriteria: Application uses a consistent color scheme throughout
Typography is clear and readable for all text elements
Layout is intuitive and makes form submission and data viewing straightforward
Visual design is appropriate for a professional service booking context

file_operations.description: Update global styles to use a professional color scheme with calming blues or greens suitable for a service business. Ensure typography uses clear, readable fonts. Add spacing and layout utilities that support clean form and table displays. Use the generated logo frontend/public/assets/generated/ac-service-logo.dim_200x200.png as a visual branding element if appropriate.

Configure Tailwind theme with a cohesive color palette (primary, secondary, accent colors) appropriate for a professional AC service booking application. Adjust typography settings for clarity and readability. Ensure spacing and layout utilities support intuitive form and data display layouts.

Create a Layout component that wraps the main application content. Include a header with the AC service branding (optionally displaying the logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/ac-service-logo.dim_200x200.png) and a clean, centered content area. Use consistent padding and spacing to ensure the form and booking list are visually organized and easy to navigate.
Wrap the BookingForm and BookingList components inside the Layout component to apply consistent header, spacing, and branding throughout the application.
